DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Fullterm Birth weight > 2500 < 4500 g 14Â±3 day age enrollment Exclusively formulafed , singleton birth Having obtain his/her legal representative 's informed consent Known suspect cowmilk allergy Congenital illness malformation may affect infant feed and/or growth Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Any readmission hospital prior enrollment Receiving prescription medication frequent use counter medication except vitamin mineral supplement Has receive intravenous antibiotic therapy oral probiotic last 7 day Currently participate another clinical study Can expect comply treatment
